output_list.code: function INTToken(uint256 initialSupply, string tokenName, uint8 decimalUnits, string tokenSymbol) token (initialSupply, tokenName, decimalUnits, tokenSymbol) {}
output_list.reason: The constructor of the contract does not check if the msg.sender is the contract owner. This could allow anyone to mint tokens and freeze accounts. The contract owner should be the only one to be able to mint tokens.
